Author: YouCanJustThrowMeAwy
Text: Just an internet stranger sending you lots of love and hugs. I’m so sorry. This is so hard and I know it feels like nobody can understand how you feel. I spent some time training to be a therapist, and the one thing I learnt from that experience is that every single person on the planet has some kind of issue and that we all question ‘why can’t I be normal’. I wish I had the answer, but I hope you know you’re not on your own.
